biotools.summary:
A user-friendly online tool for epidemiological investigation using High Resolution Melting data.

R script for strains clustering/typing and epidemiological investigation using High Resolution Melting (HRM) temperatures.

MeltingPlot is a tool for strains clustering/typing and epidemiological investigation using High Resolution Melting (HRM) temperatures.
